Package game.items

Class Coin

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.Coin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, TradableItem, Resettable
public class Coin
extends Item
implements TradableItem, Resettable
The Coin class is a class that represents the currency in the game. Players can trade with Toad and buy items if they have enough coins. The Coin class is a subclass of Item and implements the TradableItem and Resettable interfaces.
Since:
02-May-2022
Author:
Connor Gibson, Shang-Fu Tsou, Lucus Choy

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Coin​(Location location, int value)
    Constructor A coin is an item which holds value that the player can use to trade.

    • getPickUpAction

      public PickUpItemAction getPickUpAction​(Actor actor)
      Coin class should not use the PickUpItemAction as coins should not exist in the inventory. Overridden version returns null.
      Overrides:
      getPickUpAction in class Item
      Parameters:
      actor - Actor picking up the coin.
      Returns:
      null
